NAME: profile
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to view your profile or that of a member.
OPTION_USER_DESCRIPTION: The user you want to see the profile of.
TITLE: {{username}}'s Profile
IS_BOT: You cannot see the profile of a bot.
XINKO_DESCRIPTION: Xinko is a multipurpose bot that can help you create and manage your discord servers. He has a lot of features, such as moderation, fun, and much more. He is also very customizable, and you can change her language and much more.
